title: Bloomberg Markets: Netflix Beats Subscriber Forecasts
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Netflix Beats Subscriber Forecasts
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Paul Sweeney\u0010Director:North American Research\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing Netflix storming ahead in its drive to create a global television network, scoring the video-streaming provider’s best third quarter on record and sending the shares to a new high.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
